Package net.sourceforge.cruisecontrol.builders

Interface Summary
Script Shared functionality that builds based on running scripts need.
 

Class Summary
AntBuilder we often see builds that fail because the previous build is still holding on to some resource.
AntOutputLogger Understands writing all messages to a file.
AntProgressLogger Ant Logger impl used to send progress messages back to an AntBuilder.
AntProgressXmlListener Ant XmlLogger impl (for use only as a Listener) that creates log.xml file for CC build results.
AntProgressXmlLogger Ant Logger impl used to send progress messages back to an AntBuilder.
AntScript Ant script class.
CompositeBuilder  
ExecBuilder Exec builder class.
ExecScript Exec script class.
Maven2Builder Maven2 builder class based on the Maven builder class from Florin Vancea.
Maven2Script Maven2 script class based on the Maven builder class from Eric Pugh.
MavenBuilder Maven builder class.
MavenScript Maven script class.
NantBuilder  
NantScript NAnt script class.
PhingBuilder  
PhingScript  
Property Describes a name value pair of values that are passed as properties to scripts to be run.
RakeBuilder Rake builder class based on the Ant and Exec builder classes.
RakeScript Rake script class.
ScriptRunner Takes a script and runs it.
ScriptRunner.AsyncKiller  
 

Exception Summary
AntScript.ProgressLibLocatorException
